description: This file defines a login page component using React and TypeScript for a frontend web application. It includes form validation, styling, and integration with an authentication context.

methods.name: validateEmail
methods.description: Validates the email input for format and non-empty value.

methods.name: validatePassword
methods.description: Validates the password input for minimum length and non-empty.

methods.name: handleEmailBlur
methods.description: Handles validation when email input loses focus.

methods.name: handlePasswordBlur
methods.description: Handles validation when password input loses focus.

methods.name: onSubmit
methods.description: Handles form submission, including validation, authentication, and navigation.
